title: Fuse it or Lose It
itunes:title: Fuse it or Lose It
description:
Hi, it's time for another chat with your friendly neighborhood video game podcasters! This week: Rollerdrome, Cult of the Lamb, the whereabouts of Dead Rising, the Elden Ring morass, the Fortnite temptation, good MultiVersus headlines, the greatness of Wave Race 64, and more!

Advertise on The Nextlander Podcast at Gumball.fm, or support us on Patreon!

CHAPTERS

(00:00:00) NOTE: Some timecodes may be inaccurate for versions other than the ad-free Patreon version due to dynamic ad insertions. Please use caution if skipping around to avoid spoilers. Thanks for listening.
(00:00:10) Intro
(00:01:50) Where is Dead Rising these days?
(00:09:59) The language of film and a 10 year old
(00:22:11) What's going on at Nextlander?
(00:24:58) Rollerdrome [PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, PC (Microsoft Windows)] on Aug 16, 2022
(00:46:00) First Break
(00:46:07) Cult of the Lamb [Nintendo Switch, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows)] on Aug 11, 2022
(01:04:11) Elden Ring [PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 5] on Feb 25, 2022
(01:10:32) Fortnite [Mac, Xbox One, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows)] on Jul 25, 2017
(01:17:03) FUSER [Xbox One, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), Nintendo Switch] on Nov 10, 2020
(01:18:57) Second Break
(01:19:01) News
(01:19:46) THQ Nordic Showcase
(01:28:46) Hogwarts Legacy delayed
(01:30:23) PSN account linking on PC?
(01:39:33) Multiversus has some updates and good headlines
(01:42:50) Wave Race 64 is coming to Switch Online
(01:47:16) Coming up at Nextlander and thanks
(01:51:55) Mysterious Benefactor Tier Shoutouts
(01:54:28) See ya!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
